name: Pisces
text: Early spring settles over the land. Mud replaces ice underfoot, and the air carries the scent of thawing earth, though cold still lingers in the shadows.

name: Aries
text: Spring is in full bloom. New growth pushes through cracks in the stone, and the air turns sweet with fresh vegetation.

name: Taurus
text: Late spring warmth spreads through the land. Morning mists cling to low places until noon, and each dawn brings more green to chase away the last browns of winter.

name: Gemini
text: Early summer arrives with longer days and sweet air. Birdsong echoes from weathered walls, and the last spring flowers bloom in forgotten corners.

name: Cancer
text: Midsummer heat bakes stone and timber alike, its warmth lasting long into evening. The sun's relentless gaze drives the shadows from the streets.

name: Leo
text: High summer's peak. The air hangs heavy, heat persisting through the night. Even shade offers little refuge from the season's intensity.

name: Virgo
text: Late summer brings the scent of ripening fruit and turned earth. Twilight arrives earlier each day, the light taking on amber tones.

name: Libra
text: Early autumn rolls in. The first leaves spiral down from darkening branches, gathering in corners and doorways. Shadows stretch longer with each passing day.

name: Scorpio
text: Autumn deepens its hold. Dead leaves skitter across the ground, and the air grows thin and sharp, each breath visible in the morning cold.

name: Sagittarius
text: Early winter settles in. Snow masks the streets in an uneven blanket, and ice catches the pale winter light like crystalline glass.

name: Capricorn
text: Deep winter's grip tightens. Ice coats standing water, and the long nights feel darker, cold penetrating walls and foundations.

name: Aquarius
text: Late winter's final cruelty. Though the worst cold has passed, bitter winds and treacherous ice remain. Winter fights its retreat stubbornly.
